UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement on unsold other securities.

WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.label: Warrants and Rights Outstanding
WarrantsAndRightsOutstanding.description: Value of outstanding derivative securities that permit the holder the right to purchase securities (usually equity) from the issuer at a specified price.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic and Diluted (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted EPS.

GoodwillGross.label: Goodwill, Gross
GoodwillGross.description: Amount before accumulated impairment loss of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.label: Goodwill, Impaired, Accumulated Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairedAccumulatedImpairmentLos.description: Amount of accumulated impairment loss for an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillPeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: Goodwill, Period Increase (Decrease)
GoodwillPeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.label: APIC, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalShar.description: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost not yet recognized for nonvested award under share-based payment arrangement.

CashAcquiredInExcessOfPaymentsToAcquireB.label: Cash Acquired in Excess of Payments to Acquire Business
CashAcquiredInExcessOfPaymentsToAcquireB.description: The cash inflow associated with the acquisition of a business when the cash held by the acquired business exceeds the cash payments to acquire the business.

DividendsShareBasedCompensation.label: Dividend, Share-based Payment Arrangement
DividendsShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of paid and unpaid cash, stock, and paid-in-kind dividends declared for award under share-based payment arrangement.

GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

AccountsPayableInterestBearingInterestRa.label: Accounts Payable, Interest-bearing, Interest Rate
AccountsPayableInterestBearingInterestRa.description: Reflects the effective interest rate as of the balance sheet date on interest-bearing trade payables.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount (Premium) and Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountPremium.description: Amount of unamortized debt discount (premium) and debt issuance costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.label: Deferred Income Tax Liabilities, Net
DeferredIncomeTaxLiabilitiesNet.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences with jurisdictional netting.

DueFromRelatedParties.label: Due from Related Parties
DueFromRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from related parties including affiliates, employees, joint ventures, officers and stockholders, immediate families thereof, and pension funds.

FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.label: Finance Lease, Principal Payments
FinanceLeasePrincipalPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for principal payment on finance lease.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherOperatingAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in operating assets classified as other.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, Diluted
NetIncomeLossAttributableToParentDiluted.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent, and includes adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive convertible securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

UndistributedEarnings.label: Undistributed Earnings, Basic
UndistributedEarnings.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed.

UndistributedEarningsDiluted.label: Undistributed Earnings, Diluted
UndistributedEarningsDiluted.description: The earnings that is allocated to common stock and participating securities to the extent that each security may share in earnings as if all of the earnings for the period had been distributed. Includes the adjustments resulting from the assumption that dilutive securities were converted, options or warrants were exercised, or that other shares were issued upon the satisfaction of certain conditions.
